data.name: About_Title
data.value: About

data.name: Constitution_Coaches
data.value: Coaches:

data.name: Constitution_Coaches_Text
data.value: must guide the young sports people in their charge to move forward in fitness, skill, and understanding of sport. Coaches must develop the members’ appreciation for surfing and the ocean. A successful season can be measured by the amount the participants move forward, by the quality of their effort, and by their joy in participating. Wins and losses fall where they may, but hopefully they’ve learned to love to be active.

data.name: Constitution_CodeOfConduct_Li1
data.value: Respect the rights, dignity and worth of others;

data.name: Constitution_CodeOfConduct_Li2
data.value: Be fair, equitable, considerate and honest in all Dealings with others.

data.name: Constitution_CodeOfConduct_Li3
data.value: Be professional in, and accept responsibility for actions;

data.name: Constitution_CodeOfConduct_Li4
data.value: Use facilities and equipment for their proper purposes, and care for and maintain such facilities and equipment correctly;

data.name: Constitution_CodeOfConduct_Li5
data.value: Refrain from anything which may abuse, intimidate or harass others;

data.name: Constitution_CodeOfConduct_Li6
data.value: Preserve and protect the standing and reputation of the County Sligo Surf Club;

data.name: Constitution_CodeOfConduct_Li7
data.value: Understand the consequences of any breach of County Sligo Surf Club’s Member Protection Policy or Code of Conduct; ***

data.name: Constitution_FairPlayPolicy1
data.value: The County Sligo Surf Club is committed to providing a Fair Play sporting environment in which all individuals involved are treated with dignity and respect. Every participant’s experience should be positive; all participants should have an opportunity to contribute and every participant should experience success. Our sports programs encourage participation in the joy of the sport and the learning of good sportsmanship and appreciation for the ocean.

data.name: Constitution_FairPlayPolicy2
data.value: The County Sligo Surf Club has a zero tolerance policy regarding harassment: generally defined as comment, conduct, or gesture directed toward an individual or group of individuals, which is insulting, intimidating, humiliating, malicious, degrading, or offensive.

data.name: Constitution_FairPlayPolicy3
data.value: The County Sligo Surf Club believes in catering to the needs of all children and young people, from beginners to the most proficient. Special provisions may be required for children and young people who are disadvantaged or whose participation is limited for any reason.

data.name: Constitution_KeepSportFun
data.value: Keep sport fun – it’s why we do it

data.name: Constitution_Parents
data.value: Parents:

data.name: Constitution_Parents_Li1
data.value: Encourage children in their efforts in sport

data.name: Constitution_Parents_Li10
data.value: Remember that we are all capable of making mistakes

data.name: Constitution_Parents_Li2
data.value: Treat my child the same regardless of whether she/he has won or lost

data.name: Constitution_Parents_Li3
data.value: Watch my child play and let him/her enjoy the sport

data.name: Constitution_Parents_Li4
data.value: Show my appreciation to people who volunteer their time so my child can play

data.name: Constitution_Parents_Li5
data.value: Remember that my child plays sport for his/her reasons not mine

data.name: Constitution_Parents_Li6
data.value: Be a positive role model for my child

data.name: Constitution_Parents_Li7
data.value: Never place undue pressure on my child to play or perform

data.name: Constitution_Parents_Li8
data.value: Respect that people are involved in sport mostly for fun and enjoyment

data.name: Constitution_Parents_Li9
data.value: Support good play and applaud good performance from all participants

data.name: Constitution_Title
data.value: Our Constitution and Policies

data.name: Constitution_Title_CodeOfConduct
data.value: CODE OF CONDUCT FOR MEMBERS

data.name: Constitution_Title_FairPlayPolicy
data.value: FAIR PLAY POLICY – County Sligo Surf Club Code of Conduct

data.name: Constitution_TripleStars
data.value: *** County Sligo Surf Club, (sitting committee) reserves the right to terminate a membership, or enact a three strikes policy towards any member who fails to adhere to County Sligo Surf Club’s Code of Conduct.
